data.name: Tell a Demon Demo
data.detailed_description:
Your choices affect the character development of each of the three protagonists. Each viewpoint character gets one separate ending per playthrough, and many endings will vary based on your decisions throughout the story. While some choices affect a viewpoint character’s personality, others alter the plot. The stories of the three separate viewpoint characters intertwine, but how much those stories intertwine—and who survives to the end of each playthrough—depends on you.

  • A rich, fully illustrated fantasy world
  • Romantic options
  • 80,000+ words of content
  • 16 Endings with variations depending on your choices
  • Art gallery, Endings gallery, and music room available in-game

data.short_description: Tell a Demon is a visual novel set in a 1920s style fantasy world, centering around themes of love, loss, and vengeance. Influence the intertwining stories of three protagonists with your choices: Julius, who just wants to get his life back, Tell, a mortal girl who finds herself wrapped up in the affairs of demons, and Kalevel, an...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.66GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
